indications: losartan potassium hydrochlorothiazide tablets combination losartan , angiotensin ii receptor blocker ( arb ) hydrochlorothiazide , diuretic indicated :
contraindications: hypertension usual starting dose : 50/12.5 mg daily . ( 2.1 ) titrate needed maximum dose 100/25 mg. ( 2.1 ) hypertensive patients left ventricular hypertrophy controlled monotherapy : initiate 50/12.5 mg. titrate needed maximum 100/25 mg. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions: losartan potassium hydrochlorothiazide tablets , usp supplied : 100 mg/12.5 mg tablets : yellow colored , oval shaped , biconvex , film-coated tablets `` 191 `` debossed one side `` u `` debossed side . ndc : 72162-2461-0 : 1000 tablets bottle ndc : 72162-2461-3 : 30 tablets bottle ndc : 72162-2461-9 : 90 tablets bottle store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . keep container tightly closed . protect light . repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc.burbank , ca 91504
adverseReactions: hypersensitivity component losartan potassium hydrochlorothiazide tablets . ( 4 ) anuria . ( 4 ) coadministration aliskiren patients diabetes . ( 4 )

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

name: losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide
indications_original: Losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets are combination of losartan, an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) and hydrochlorothiazide, a diuretic indicated for:
contraindications_original: Hypertension Usual starting dose: 50/12.5 mg once daily. ( 2.1 ) Titrate as needed to a maximum dose of 100/25 mg. ( 2.1 ) Hypertensive Patients with Left Ventricular Hypertrophy Not controlled on monotherapy: Initiate with 50/12.5 mg.      Titrate as needed to a maximum of 100/25 mg. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets, USP are supplied as:
                  100 mg/12.5 mg Tablets: Yellow colored, oval shaped, biconvex, film-coated tablets with "191" debossed on one side and "U" debossed on other side.
                  NDC: 72162-2461-0: 1000 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 72162-2461-3: 30 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 72162-2461-9: 90 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Keep container tightly closed. Protect from light.
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions_original: Hypersensitivity to any component of losartan      potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets. ( 4 ) Anuria. ( 4 ) Coadministration with aliskiren in      patients with diabetes. ( 4 )
